predicate.note: Frames file for 'stymie' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: active
example.text: But while U.S. interest may be big and growing, the difficulties that [*T*-1] have stymied deals in the past show no sign of abating.

example.name: passive
example.text: Knowledgeable employees said the project had been stymied [*-1] somewhat by ``the difficulty of designing'' the jackets.
example.arg: the difficulty of designing the jackets
